comments.body:
The blob data is proto encoded. You can use tctl admin shard command to show shard info data. 

BTW, @Allentent , please use our community forum or public slack for further questions. This is not the right place to ask questions. Thank you. 
Community forum: https://community.temporal.io/
Public slack: https://temporal.io/slack

> The blob data is proto encoded. You can use tctl admin shard command to show shard info data.
> 
> BTW, @Allentent , please use our community forum or public slack for further questions. This is not the right place to ask questions. Thank you. Community forum: https://community.temporal.io/ Public slack: https://temporal.io/slack

OK, thanks

title: I have used mysql database, how to see the blob field detail ?
